<page title>: Cleverboxes - E2473HS-GB1 | Iiyama ProLite E2473HS (23.6 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor 1000:1 300cd/m2 (1920x1080) 2ms D-Sub/DVI-D/HDMI/Headphone (Black)
description: HDMI stands for High-Definition Multimedia Interface. Much smaller and more convenient than DVI, HDMI also has the significant advantage over DVI that it supports audio as well as video signals. A typical CCFL LCD uses four backlight lamps. Using LED diodes considerably lowers the power consumption and reduces the CO2 emission into the environment making this LCD a true ECO-Friendly product. When very fast graphics are displayed your monitor can sometimes get blurry. Turning on the OverDrive feature will eliminate that. VESA mount compliance means you can easily mount your monitor to a wall. This LED monitor is equipped with two high quality stereo speakers. Comfortable and easy to reach, especially if you want to mount your monitor to a wall.
in the box: Iiyama ProLite E2473HS Monitor (Black), Power cable, VGA (D-Sub) cable, DVI-D cable, Audio cable, Stand, Cable holder, Quick start guide, Safety guide
language selection: 8 languages (EN, DE, FR, NL, PL, Chinese, JP, RU)
user controls: Auto adjust, picture adjust (contrast, brightness, ACR, ECO, OD, X-Res Technology), input select, audio adjust (volume, mute, HDMI audio), colour adjust, information, manual image adjust (clock, H/V position, phase, sharpness, video mode adjust), setup menu (language, OSD position, OSD time out, OSD background, opening logo, LED), memory recall and 5 front controls (Power, Select/ Input Select, Scroll up/ X-Res technology, Scroll down/ i-Style Colour, Menu)
warranty: Two years on-site (plus 1 free year extra - registration required).
